text:
Hi Jon,

Hope you're well!

This is going to be a bizzare year... 
Wondering if Union let's people work from home in these circumstances..? I've heard lots of different things on what's going on in vfx atm so at this point I imagine it's gonna be even more of a while to get a job that's for sure.. But what can I do. Will live and see hopefully :)

AUB and BU are still open so I have to go in but all the 1st and 2nd year students are doing just live drawing from home till further notice. Means I don't have to do any demonstrating so I'm practically in just in case someone needs something suddenly. 

Stay safe!

Lasma

P.s thank you for the advice. I think in May I'll start sending my showreel to all the companies I'd like to work for and tell them when I'm available. Rest is up to them. If there's anything positive this virus has given for me then that's just some peace to not worry about it too much. There's more important things in life
